body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for reaching out to Car Deals Inc. My name is Henry Russell. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Lisa. Could you kindly provide me with your contact number in the format of seven seven eight, one two three, four five six seven?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's seven seven eight, nine zero one, two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks, Lisa. Additionally, for security purposes, could you share your month and year of birth in the format of one two, one nine eight five?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two, one nine eight five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Lisa. We are sorry to hear about your disappointment regarding the product quality. We assure you that we will do our best to address your concerns.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Henry. I hope for a resolution soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your patience, Lisa. We will keep you updated on the progress. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Henry. You too. Goodbye.
